desc: Exchanges a refresh token for a new app configuration token.

refresh_token.desc: The `xoxe` refresh token that was issued along with the old app configuration token.

token.desc: The app configuration token used to access App Manifest APIs

team_id.desc: ID of the team associated with the access token.

user_id.desc: The ID of the user associated with the token.

exp.desc: Expiration time (exp) identifies the expiration time on or after which the token must not be accepted for processing.

iat.desc: Issued at (iat) identifies the time at which the token was issued.

invalid_refresh_token.desc: The given refresh token is invalid.

unknown_error.desc: Temporary error for dev only restriction

error.description: Typical error response if incorrect refresh token used
